model

Interface EncryptTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShiftTool, SubstitutionTool

    public interface EncryptTool
    Encryption tool, Static class that has various methods to mutate strings a number of different ways. NOTE: I feel there is no need for this to be anything other than static, as it should not be responsible for any data storage.
    Author:
    Connor Guerra

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String shift(int intp_shift, java.lang.String word)
      String mutator, shifts the ENTIRE string by a given number of characters in the ASCII character set.
      java.lang.String substitution(char chrp_target, char chrp_replace, java.lang.String strp_sentence)
      String mutator, loops through a given string and replaces all target characters with the replacement character.

    • Method Detail

      • substitution

        java.lang.String substitution(char chrp_target,
                              char chrp_replace,
                              java.lang.String strp_sentence)
        String mutator, loops through a given string and replaces all target characters with the replacement character. Changes one character at a time.
        Parameters:
        chrp_target - Target character, character to be replaced.
        chrp_replace - Replacement character, replaces all target characters.
        strp_sentence - Given string, will have all targets replaced with designated character.
        Returns:
        Mutated string that has all target characters replaced.

      • shift

        java.lang.String shift(int intp_shift,
                       java.lang.String word)
        String mutator, shifts the ENTIRE string by a given number of characters in the ASCII character set.
        Parameters:
        intp_shift - Integer amount that you wish to shift the string by.
        strp_sentence - Given string to be shifted
        Returns:
        Mutated string that has been shifted by the given amount.
